Calling Method ::::

1. URL : IP/PORT/NbfiSmsGateway/NBFISmsGateWayV1
2. Method : POST
3. Parameter Possition : Body > raw > text/xml
4. Parameter format :

<SMS_INFO>
	<SMS_PARAM>
		<URL>http://sms.sslwireless.com/pushapi/dynamic/server.php?</URL>
		<msisdn>8801791709161</msisdn>
		<sms>Developed by Roman.</sms>
		<user>Cvcflbulk</user>
		<pass>cvcfL@26@20</pass>
		<sid>CVCFLbulkbng</sid>
		<csmsid>88484</csmsid>
	</SMS_PARAM>
</SMS_INFO>
